channel.title: [pi] Shop prices are actin weird[pi]
channel.description:
hello everyone i have some items in a shop and the prices are acting all weird... like in item.cfg the price of an item, lets just say elysian spirit shield, the price on its 1,000,000,000 (1billion gp) but when i put it in the shop it says its 115million..
heres what the elysian spirit shields item.cfg line looks like...
[code]item = 13742 Elysian_spirit_shield An_ethereal_shield_with_an__Elysian_sigil_attached_to_it. 1000000000 1000000000 1000000000 0 0 0 0 0 63 65 75 2 57 0 3[/code]
im not sure what else to do with it... so does anyone know what to do?

item.title: [pi] Shop prices are actin weird[pi]
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Go Date -> cfg -> prices.txt

Search for the item id then edit the price

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Shop prices are actin weird[pi]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

go to config and use prices.txt

Read full topic
